graph TB

        UI[User Interface]
        COMP[Components]
    end

        WORK[Workflows]
    end

        API[API Clients]
        CACHE[Cache]
    end

    subgraph "External Services"
        GH[GitHub API]
        LIN[Linear API]
        AI[AI Services]
    end

    UI --> COMP
    COMP --> SERV
    SERV --> WORK
    WORK --> API
    API --> GH
    API --> LIN
    API --> AI
    SERV --> CACHE

    classDef frontend fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1976d2
    classDef business fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#7b1fa2
    classDef data fill:#e8f5e8,stroke:#388e3c
    classDef external fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#f57c00
    class UI,COMP frontend
    class SERV,WORK business
    class API,CACHE data
    class GH,LIN,AI external

## ðŸ“Š Code Analysis Diagrams

### Class Relationships

```mermaid
flowchart TD
    C0[ConversationMemory]
    C1[IntelligentAgent]
    C2[WorkflowAutomation]

    classDef default fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1976d2,stroke-width:2px

```

### API Interaction Flow

```mermaid
sequenceDiagram
    participant Client
    participant App
    participant API
    participant DB

    Client->>+App: arrow_function()
    App->>+API: HTTP Request
    API->>+DB: Query Data
    DB-->>-API: Return Data
    API-->>-App: HTTP Response
    App-->>-Client: Return Result

    Client->>+App: arrow_function()
    App->>+API: HTTP Request
    API->>+DB: Query Data
    DB-->>-API: Return Data
    API-->>-App: HTTP Response
    App-->>-Client: Return Result

```

### Project Architecture

```mermaid
graph TB
    subgraph "Frontend Layer"
        UI[User Interface]
        COMP[Components]
    end

    subgraph "Business Logic Layer"
        SERV[Services]
        WORK[Workflows]
    end

    subgraph "Data Layer"
        API[API Clients]
        CACHE[Cache]
    end

    subgraph "External Services"
        GH[GitHub API]
        LIN[Linear API]
        AI[AI Services]
    end

    UI --> COMP
    COMP --> SERV
    SERV --> WORK
    WORK --> API
    API --> GH
    API --> LIN
    API --> AI
    SERV --> CACHE

    classDef frontend fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1976d2
    classDef business fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#7b1fa2
    classDef data fill:#e8f5e8,stroke:#388e3c
    classDef external fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#f57c00
    class UI,COMP frontend
    class SERV,WORK business
    class API,CACHE data
    class GH,LIN,AI external

```
